<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// skip constraining as the instruction defining the register would constrain</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OpRC) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Obtain the RC from incoming regbank if it is a proper sub-class. Operands</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can have multiple regbanks for a superclass that combine different</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// register types (E.g., AMDGPU&#39;s VGPR and AGPR). The regbank ambiguity</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// resolved by targets during regbankselect should not be overridden.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SubRC = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>.getCommonSubClass(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to use unmerge for irregular vector split where possible</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example when splitting a &lt;6 x i32&gt; into &lt;4 x i32&gt; with &lt;2 x i32&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// leftover, it becomes:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  &lt;2 x i32&gt; %2, &lt;2 x i32&gt;%3, &lt;2 x i32&gt; %4 = G&#95;UNMERGE&#95;VALUE &lt;6 x i32&gt; %1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  &lt;4 x i32&gt; %5 = G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTOR &lt;2 x i32&gt; %2, &lt;2 x i32&gt; %3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RegTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a7da5cc6e8aadd4d5fb6dd68f8ec12b7e">isVector</a>() &amp;&amp; MainTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a7da5cc6e8aadd4d5fb6dd68f8ec12b7e">isVector</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RegNumElts = RegTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a71181d67d0bf68c3b8a535ec20463f90">getNumElements</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LeftoverNumElts = RegNumElts % MainNumElts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If can unmerge to LeftoverTy, do it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
